last_episode_to_air.name: “I wouldn’t have it any other way.”
last_episode_to_air.overview: It’s been a whirlwind summer for Taylor culminating in her marriage to Riyad. But with no dress, no rings and a mother who doesn’t seem in a hurry, will she walk down the aisle on time? Meanwhile, Sam has a decision to make with her business plans while Cat has yet another brainwave to test the water with.

name: Married To The Game
overview: Offering unprecedented access to the lives of the wives and girlfriends of renowned Premier League footballers during the summer break and the transfer window.

episodes.name: "That’s the brutal thing about football"
episodes.overview: Fresh from watching their husbands win the treble, Sara and Taylor’s lives are about to be rocked by shock moves away from Manchester. Meanwhile, Cat is throwing an extravagant birthday party and has a big surprise in store for Jorginho.

episodes.name: “I’m a woman in football. It’s tough.”
episodes.overview: It’s all change for Sara and Taylor as they say goodbye to their Manchester mates and head to pastures new. Cat and Sam deal with the downside of social media while Ash prepares for the birth of their baby without her husband, Matt.

episodes.name: “This is the life.”
episodes.overview: Taylor experiences Saudi life for the first time as she explores Jeddah while Sara also begins to find her feet in Barcelona. Emotions run high for Ash as she waves goodbye to Matt unsure if he’ll make it back in time for the birth while Cat takes the plunge with her new styling company. And tears of joy for Sam and James as they relive their special day with their loved ones back home.

episodes.name: “It’s getting real!”
episodes.overview: It’s a race against time for Matt to make it back for the birth while Sam and Cat are focused on their own babies i.e. their new business ventures. Meanwhile Taylor and Sara are house hunting in their new cities with a blank canvas and a blank cheque book to match.

episodes.name: “We don’t know what’s on the horizon, do we?”
episodes.overview: With her new life in Saudi beginning to take shape, Taylor is back in Manchester with her wedding just days away and her mother Dawn is in town to give her some constructive feedback. Talking of mums, Jorginho’s pays a visit which sees Cat taking some last-minute Portuguese lessons and new mum Ash is getting to grips with life as a foursome. Meanwhile Sam has some thinking to do.

episodes.name: “I wouldn’t have it any other way.”
episodes.overview: It’s been a whirlwind summer for Taylor culminating in her marriage to Riyad. But with no dress, no rings and a mother who doesn’t seem in a hurry, will she walk down the aisle on time? Meanwhile, Sam has a decision to make with her business plans while Cat has yet another brainwave to test the water with.
